long_description: Four easy-squeeze 10 fl. oz. flasks remain comfortable over long distances thanks to the lightweight, fully adjustable Nathan Trail Mix 4 Hydration Belt. 4-flask belt features dual adjustment points to customize fit. Monofilament belt stretches up to 20% for a bounce-free ride. External power-stretch mesh pocket and a zippered pocket keep key essentials organized and secure. The Nathan Trail Mix 4 Hydration Belt has 2 shockcords with a 1-pull tension lock to hold a light jacket or gloves.
short_description: Four easy-squeeze 10 fl. oz. flasks remain comfortable over long distances thanks to the lightweight, fully adjustable Nathan Trail Mix 4 Hydration Belt.
